titles.title: A resolution in support of a peaceful, negotiated settlement to the Cyprus dispute.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 8/10/1988--Introduced. Commends President Vassiliou of Cyprus and Turkish Cypriot leader Denktash for agreeing to meet to resolve the Cyprus issue. Congratulates United Nations Secretary General Javier Perez de Cuellar for arranging the meeting and expresses support for continued U.N. mediation in Cyprus.
